name: com.siemens.ros-sharp
description: ROS# is a ROS bridge for the .NET ecosystem, enabling communication and control of robots and robotic systems using C# and other .NET platforms. Unity-specific extensions to [RosBridgeClient](https://github.com/siemens/ros-sharp/tree/master/Libraries/RosBridgeClient)

samples.description: Sample scene and script to demonstrate preprocessor directives usage for different ROS versions.
Sample scene for Fibonacci example. See the wiki for more information.
Sample scene for Gazebo example. See the wiki for more information.
Sample scene for simulation example. See the wiki for more information.
